name: 西部幻想 WestFantasy
description:
Introduction: [/b] [/h2]
Want to experience Pixel RedDead again? In an elevated world called the Western Continent, embark on a fantastic adventure!
let's sand sculpture together, hahaha!

Almost all NPCs can be killed or become comrades to conquer and discover powerful NPCs.

Original cowboy duel system, experiencing the glory of the principle of drawing a gun and the pleasure of instant killing!

Super rich game content: 30+hours of mainline flow, 18 scenes of open world map,

Hundreds of NPCs, dozens of side quests, dozens of puzzle solving+mini games, and multi line endings.

12 distinctive weapons and master skills, flexibly matched and showcased in operation~

Western Fantasy is an abnormal open world pixel sand sculpture RPG game that focuses on "free exploration" and "spiritual confrontation" in gameplay.
You can choose the clearance method according to your own preferences, including but not limited to: collecting powerful weapons, treasure hunting, dueling, gambling, engaging in intrigues with NPCs, looting, and even card bugs.
After passing through the teaching level, the game will open up the entire western continent for players to explore, and you can choose your own development path.
